real_commentary: And away we go...
our_sequence_commentary: [Kick Off] The first half begins. Group Stage match between Belgium and Romania!

real_commentary: Oh, WOW! Talk about fast starts. Belgium could not wish for a better start as a sweeping move ends with Romelu Lukaku teeing-up Youri Tielemans for the sweetest of finishes from about 18 yards. The Red Devils are up and running.
our_sequence_commentary: [Goal] Goal! Belgium 0, Romania 0. Youri Tielemans scores with a right-footed shot from the edge of the box, assisted by Romelu Lukaku.

real_commentary: Belgium's goal after 73 seconds is their earliest ever in a match at a major international tournament.
our_sequence_commentary: [Corner] Corner for Romania, delivered by Dennis Man, conceded by Arthur Theate. Romania applying early pressure.

real_commentary: This is being played at 200mph! Now Romania come close to an equaliser through Radu Dragusin's header but Koen Casteels makes a fine save pushing it over the bar. It's end-to-end stuff.
our_sequence_commentary: [Shot Saved] Attempt saved. Radu Drăgușin's header from the center of the box denied by Koen Casteels.

real_commentary: More on that goal by Tielemans. He struck it first-time and it was only going to hit the back of the net. Sweet, sweet finish.
our_sequence_commentary: [Foul] Foul by Kevin De Bruyne (Belgium) on Florin Constantin Niţă (Romania) in the defensive half.

real_commentary: All four teams in Group E have three points as it stands. Next Wednesday's final round of games in this group could be fun!
our_sequence_commentary: [General] Romania dominating early, controlling 75% possession, mostly in Belgium's defensive third.

real_commentary: Jeremy Doku is teasing the Romanian defence with some clever play. The Manchester City man tries to set up Youri Tielemans for another goal but this time his attempt is blocked.
our_sequence_commentary: [Shot Blocked] Attempt blocked. Youri Tielemans' right foot shot from the edge of the box denied by Nicolae Stanciu.

real_commentary: Cologne is witnessing one of the most frantic and entertaining starts to a game at Euro 2024...as well as one of the best atmospheres. Honestly, both sets of fans in the stands are giving off BIG energy.
our_sequence_commentary: [Shot Blocked] Attempt blocked. Romelu Lukaku's right footed shot from the center of the box denied by Nicușor Bancu.

real_commentary: Make no mistake, Belgium are on it tonight. They are playing like they are No 3 in the world.
our_sequence_commentary: [Shot Missed] Attempt missed. Jan Vertonghen's left footed shot from the centre of the box goes over the bar.

real_commentary: That's a great stat, Chris. This Euros is a great watch.
our_sequence_commentary: [Foul] Foul by Nicușor Silviu Bancu (Romania) on Dodi Lukebakio (Belgium). Free kick awarded in midfield.

real_commentary: It's all Belgium at this moment in time. After Jeremy Doku tries to walk the ball into the net, Belgium win a corner before Romania pounce on the counter. It's like a winner-takes-all tie.
our_sequence_commentary: [Injury] Valentin Mihai Mihăilă (Romania) down with an injury.

real_commentary: What is it about Saturday nights and Euro 2024? Albania scored after 23 SECONDS against Italy last Saturday. Belgium have scored after 73 SECONDS in Cologne
our_sequence_commentary: [Foul] Foul by Romania on Koen Casteels (Belgium) in the defensive half.

real_commentary: Just the one attempt on target by Romania so far. It brought a fine save from Koen Casteels. It seems a long time ago already. They've been on the ropes since.
our_sequence_commentary: [Foul] Foul by Marius Mihai Marin (Romania) on Kevin De Bruyne (Belgium). Free kick awarded.

real_commentary: The Red Devils are being devilishly exciting. They're really turning on the style with clever flicks and turns. Jeremy Doku is full of twists and turns. He's just brought another save from Florin Nita.
our_sequence_commentary: [General] Belgium controlling the game with 100% possession, dominating midfield play.

real_commentary: Another attempt. This time Dodi Lukebakio's shot takes a deflection and flies over the bar. Belgium look bright and alert. That was their ninth attempt.
our_sequence_commentary: [Foul] Foul by Dodi Lukebakio (Belgium) in the six yard box.

real_commentary: A yellow card for Dodi Lukebakio for a foul on the yellow-shirted Denis Dragus. The Belgium player had no choice after a poor pass but he will now miss Belgium's final group game.
our_sequence_commentary: [Yellow Card] Dodi Lukebakio (Belgium) shown a yellow card for a foul on Denis Mihai Drăguş (Romania).

real_commentary: Despite Belgium's dominance, Romania are still in this and look dangerous on the counter. In all honesty the Red Devils should have a more handsome lead. There will be serious questions asked if they do not win this.
our_sequence_commentary: [Shot Saved] Attempt saved. Dennis Man's left footed shot from the left side of the box denied by Koen Casteels.

real_commentary: Oh my goodness! Almost a big chance for Romania as Denis Dragus almost gets to the ball before goalkeeper Koen Casteels after a long ball forward.
our_sequence_commentary: [Corner] Corner for Belgium, delivered by Romelu Lukaku.

real_commentary: Romania are struggling to get a touch. Belgium continue to dominate with half-time looming.
our_sequence_commentary: [General] Belgium dominating possession with 85.4%, controlling the midfield for 2 minutes. Kevin De Bruyne highly active.

real_commentary: Dozens and dozens of blue, yellow and red flags being waved in the stands. Romania's fans still believe.
our_sequence_commentary: [General] Belgium dominating midfield with 83.3% possession, controlling play for 3 minutes. Dodi Lukebakio active with 13 events.

real_commentary: Corner to Romania right at the end of the first half. It falls nicely for Andrei Burca but he cannot keep his header down.
our_sequence_commentary: [Shot Missed] Attempt missed. Andrei Burcă Andonie heads the ball over from the center of the box.

real_commentary: Will Belgium finish the job? Back under way in Cologne.
our_sequence_commentary: [Kick Off] The second half is underway. Belgium and Romania still level at 0-0.

real_commentary: And Romania come flying out of the traps as Dennis Man forces a save in the opening minute of the second half. It was comfortable for Koen Casteels in the end.
our_sequence_commentary: [General] Possession evenly split; Romania slightly ahead with 52.6%.

real_commentary: A huge chance for Valentin Mihaila! He looks as though he is clean through with a Belgium defender trailing in his wake but his final touch isn't the best and he balloons it over. Will Romania be left regretting that miss?
our_sequence_commentary: [Shot Missed] Attempt missed. Valentin Mihai Mihăilă's left footed shot from the centre of the box goes off target.

real_commentary: This is so well poised. Intriguing, exciting, riveting and engrossing.
our_sequence_commentary: [General] Belgium dominating midfield with 62.8% possession, controlling the flow of play.

real_commentary: Now KDB doing KDB things. Kevin de Bruyne spots an opening just outside Romania's penalty area and tries to bend it into the corner. It falls agonisingly wide. Over the hill? Do me a favour...
our_sequence_commentary: [Shot Missed] Attempt missed. Kevin De Bruyne's right footed shot from the right side of the box goes wide.

real_commentary: Jan Vertonghen is caught by Denis Dragus. It ends in the most reluctant handshake I have ever seen.
our_sequence_commentary: [Injury] Injury concern for Belgium as Jeremy Doku goes down.

real_commentary: Another chance for Kevin de Bruyne. Not as spectacular as his attempt a few moments ago but it still forces Florin Nita to react.
our_sequence_commentary: [Foul] Foul by Denis Mihai Drăguş (Romania) on Jan Vertonghen (Belgium) in midfield.

real_commentary: Leandro Trossard is introduced to the action in place of Dodi Lukébakio, who was booked earlier and will miss Belgium's final group game against Ukraine.
our_sequence_commentary: [Substitution] Substitution for Belgium. Leandro Trossard replaces Dodi Lukebakio in a tactical change.

real_commentary: ITV are reporting "one or two missiles" were thrown at Jeremy Doku from the crowd after another chance for Belgium goes begging. Not good news.
our_sequence_commentary: [Shot Blocked] Attempt blocked. Romelu Lukaku's right-footed shot from the center of the box denied by Marius Marin.

real_commentary: Nicusor Bancu becomes the first Romania player to be booked. There are flares being held aloft behind the goal where Romania's fans are seated. They're making one heck of a noise too.
our_sequence_commentary: [Foul] Foul by Romania on Youri Tielemans (Belgium) in the defensive half.

real_commentary: Outstanding match. Outstanding atmosphere. Will Romania get themselves back into this?
our_sequence_commentary: [General] Belgium controlling the game with 100% possession, De Bruyne leading the charge.

real_commentary: It won't count! A huge roar from Romania's fans. It's been chalked off for offside.
our_sequence_commentary: [Shot Missed] Attempt missed. Jeremy Doku's left footed shot from the center of the box goes over the target.

real_commentary: Romelu Lukaku's Euro 2024 is up and running! A composed finish after a lovely pass from Kevin de Bruyne through the middle. It''s really well taken by Lukaku who spins away to celebrate and is mobbed by Belgium's substitutes.
our_sequence_commentary: [Shot Missed] Attempt missed. Jeremy Doku's left footed shot from the center of the box goes over the target.

real_commentary: Romelu Lukaku at Euro 2024... Three goal celebrations. Three goals disallowed. He looks furious!
our_sequence_commentary: [Yellow Card] Marius Mihai Marin (Romania) shown a yellow card for a foul on Kevin De Bruyne (Belgium).

real_commentary: Romelu Lukaku's goal was ruled out by VAR. It took about 20 seconds to make the decision and get the game back under way. There are lessons to be learned there...
our_sequence_commentary: [Substitution] Substitution for Romania. Marius Mihai Marin makes way for Darius Dumitru Olaru.

real_commentary: Honestly, you cannot take your eyes off this! Now Dennis Man is charging towards the Belgium goal but his finish lacks conviction and Koen Casteels makes the save. Big, big chance.
our_sequence_commentary: [Foul] Foul by Wout Faes (Belgium) on Ianis Hagi (Romania) in midfield.

real_commentary: This might just be the best 1-0 I have seen in years. It's compelling, edge of your seat stuff.
our_sequence_commentary: [General] Romania dominating midfield with 87% possession, Belgium struggling to keep up.

real_commentary: There's still time for Romania. They've made a couple of change. Off go Marius Marin and Valentin Mihaila. On come Ianis Hagi and Darius Olaru.
our_sequence_commentary: [Substitution] Double change for Belgium. Youri Tielemans and Jeremy Doku off; Orel Mangala and another fresh face on.

real_commentary: There's still time for Romania. They've made a couple of change. Off go Marius Marin and Valentin Mihaila. On come Ianis Hagi and Darius Olaru.
our_sequence_commentary: [Substitution] Double change for Belgium. Yannick Ferreira Carrasco and Youri Tielemans replace Jeremy Doku.

real_commentary: Now Belgium have sent on Yannick Carrasco and Orel Mangala to see this out. Goalscorer Youri Tielemans has been replaced. So too Jeremy Doku.
our_sequence_commentary: [General] Romania continues to dominate, holding 93.6% possession, controlling the midfield.

real_commentary: There's a rare lull in action. Are both teams preparing for a late surge? Loads of energy all around the ground as well. Both sets of fans are giving it everything.
our_sequence_commentary: [Substitution] Substitution for Belgium. Arthur Theate off due to injury, replaced by Zeno Debast.

real_commentary: This one is going to count, isn't it? Romania are caught out at the back and Kevin de Bruyne holds off Radu Dragusin before firing past Florin Nita. There's a goal check going on...
our_sequence_commentary: [Foul] Foul by Romania on Koen Casteels (Belgium) in the defensive half.

real_commentary: Goal check over. And the Belgium celebrations can really begin.
our_sequence_commentary: [Goal] Goal! Belgium 0, Romania 0. Kevin De Bruyne scores with a right footed shot from the centre of the box.

real_commentary: Belgium are trying to put this to bed. Leandro Trossard tries to square it to Romelu Lukaku but his pass is intercepted.
our_sequence_commentary: [Corner] Corner for Romania, delivered by Nicolae Stanciu. Conceded by Zeno Debast. Romania is pressing as the game remains open.

real_commentary: One assist for Romelu Lukaku. One goal for Kevin de Bruyne. Belgium's old guard have shown up in Cologne.
our_sequence_commentary: [General] Romania asserting dominance with 100% possession, controlling midfield play.

real_commentary: Almost a goal back for Romania! Substitute Denis Alibec dinks it towards the net but it lacks power and Belgium are able to clear.
our_sequence_commentary: [Shots] Romania applying pressure with two attempts; Alibec's shot blocked, Drăgușin's header goes wide.

real_commentary: Belgium were embarrassed by Slovakia the other day. Their response has been impressive. They thoroughly deserve this.
our_sequence_commentary: [Foul] Foul by Axel Witsel (Belgium) on Nicușor Silviu Bancu (Romania). Free kick awarded in Romania's defensive half.

real_commentary: Romalu Lukaku wants a goal! More frustration for Belgium's No 10 as he is denied by the foot of Florin Nita. Will he score at these Euros?
our_sequence_commentary: [Substitution] Substitution for Romania. Deian Cristian Sorescu replaces Andrei Florin Ratiu in a tactical switch.

real_commentary: We're going to have four minutes of additional time. By the way, do not write Romania off from the Euros. They face Slovakia next and can still advance.
our_sequence_commentary: [Foul] Foul by Jan Vertonghen (Belgium) on Denis Alibec (Romania) in midfield.

real_commentary: Here come Romania. A long-range attempt by Radu Dragusin. It's deflected over for a corner.
our_sequence_commentary: [Free Kick] Free kick awarded to Romania after a foul by Belgium on Răzvan Marin.

real_commentary: Belgium's Euro 2024 is up and running!
our_sequence_commentary: [Corner] Corner for Romania. Delivered by Ianis Hagi, conceded by Koen Casteels.

real_commentary: Belgium's fans are partying in the stands. And why not? This is the night their Euros have come alive.
our_sequence_commentary: [Corner] Corner for Romania. Delivered by Ianis Hagi, conceded by Koen Casteels.
